If you want to change the look of your Departure Board you can do so here. You can change the colours that iTravel uses
The format for the colour is #RGB using Hexadecimal (0 to F). Search Google for typical codes and colours. e.g. #F00 = Red and #FFF = White. The # symbol in front is very important - don't forget it
